DOC.brief_summary: Objective : The aim clinical study evaluate tooth color alteration ( ΔE ) tooth sensitivity ( TS ) patient use two commercial brand-whitening dentifrice four week . Sixty participant select accordance inclusion exclusion criterion randomly allocate three group ( n=20 ) : G1-Colgate Luminous White® , G2- Close White Now® G3- Sorriso® dentifrice ( placebo ) . Then , participant receive instruction use blind supplied dentifrice toothbrush make habitual oral hygiene , three time per day four week . Evaluators assess tooth color ( CIEL*a*b system ) TS ( VAS scale ) baseline every week ( assessment point 1 , 2 , 3 4 ) . Two-way ANOVA posterior Tukey Friedman test analyze data ( α = 0.05 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study Whitening Dentifrices Tooth Color Sensitivity
DOC.criteria: At least six anterior teeth without restoration Participants good general oral health ( dental caries periodontal disease ) Tooth sensitivity Any condition could cause tooth sensitivity ( noncarious cervical lesion , dentin exposure ) Participants follow orthodontic treatment Smokers
